堭字的基本解释

堭
huáng
〔堂堭〕殿堂。
古同“隍”，无水的护城壕。

堭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huáng］
(1)殿堂。
(2)同“隍”。无水的护城壕。

堭字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　堭； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页233第31
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡光切，音皇。【博雅】堂堭，合殿也。【左傳】【漢書】?省作皇。　又與隍通，城下池也。【子夏易傳】城復于堭。

堭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
堭字的起名意思

殿堂，如堂堭。

堭
Basic explanation of words
堭
huáng
〔堂堭〕The hall.
In ancient times, the "Huang" is a moat without water.
堭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huáng］
(1) The palace.
(2) Same as "Huang". An anhydrous moat.
堭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　堭; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 233 31
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Guangqie, the emperor of sound. 【Bo Ya】Tangyu, and the hall. [Zuo Zhuan] [Han]? The province is the emperor.　It is connected with Huang again, and the pool under the city is also. [Zi Xia Yi Chuan] The city is restored to Yuhou.
